attributes.action: Extend the self-assessment filing deadline to 31/3/2021.
attributes.additional_details:
The precedent has also been set by Limited Company accounts being extended automatically by 3 months. 
I feel the same should apply here.
attributes.background:
I run a small accountancy firm in South London and have seen first-hand the effect that COVID has had on small business.
Countless have lost business, are stressed and/or struggling to pay their tax. In addition, with schools closing now for a few weeks the need for this to happen is very pressing.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558528
